main event: Sixteen objects were observed flying in formation and disappearing and reappearing at different times.
interesting points: The objects were the same color as the clouds., The observer noted that there were white cranes in the area but had never seen them fly in formation., The sighting occurred on 31 May 1949 at about 11:50 AM., The observer's location was approximately 2 miles north of the main highway., The conclusion made by the report was that the objects were birds.
witness description: The observer reported seeing the objects while looking at clouds, estimated their altitude at 25,000 feet, and compared their color to that of the clouds.
